headline: Here's Why Lennox (LII) Is a Great 'Buy the Bottom' Stock Now
summary: Lennox (LII) witnesses a hammer chart pattern, indicating support found by the stock after losing some value lately. This coupled with an upward trend in earnings estimate revisions could mean a trend reversal for the stock in the near term.
